item.title: How to tidy Catapult 10Hz export data
item.description: The export format of Catapult’s 10Hz GPS exports is ideal for analysis. This article teaches you how you can tidy it using R.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a sports scientist and athletic performance coach based in Sydney, Australia. I’ll be posting my work and ideas on sports science and performance on this site, my Twitter, and my Youtube channel. My employment and education history can be found in my one-page résumé or full CV. Feel free to contact me via email or DM me through any of my social media accounts on the sidebar of this site.
